rev.comment: /* Using a compass */ - extra "a" in sentence.
Lots of claims with no support
contrasting Needhams eccentric interpretations with others authors' findings
invention of early form of the 4 main forms of compasses (other chinese compasses historically very marginal phenomenon)
No reason to get rid of this, since this lead part clarifies what will be stated in the text.
adding pic since other one was deleted
